reviewText: Not what I expected from a "men in prison" film. I mean, just "ONE fight scene" and the rest is TALKING. In your opinion, does THAT sound like a "men-in-prison" film to YOU? You really wanna see a GENUINE "men-in-prison," film? Watch Lockdown!
Kind of corney but it give some good performances.
Not the greatest plot but entertaining nonetheless. I have worked at this prison, that's why the 5 stars.
the movie was great to see again,,i have been wanting to buy this movie for awhail now and now the price is wright and it is now on dvd finly no vhs, and hd quality..so Thank you very much Amazon.com
